level.heading: Governing law.
level.text: The law of the District shall govern:
The internal affairs of a limited liability company; and
The liability of a member as member and a manager as manager for the debts, obligations, or other liabilities of a limited liability company.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

level.heading: Uniform Law:
level.text: This section is based on ยง 106 of the Uniform Limited Company Act (2006 Act). See Vol. 6B , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.
